past_events.name: The Merge (PoW to PoS)
past_events.news_example: Ethereum transitioned to Proof-of-Stake on 15 Sep 2022, cutting energy usage by over 99%.

past_events.name: Dencun Upgrade (Proto-Danksharding)
past_events.news_example: Ethereumâ€™s Dencun upgrade went live on 13 Mar 2024, reducing layer-2 fees significantly.

past_events.name: Spot ETH ETF Approval
past_events.news_example: SEC approved several spot Ether ETFs, boosting institutional demand for Ethereum.

past_events.name: Bybit Hack (~$1.5B ETH stolen)
past_events.news_example: Bybit reported one of the largest crypto heists with over $1.5 billion in ETH stolen.

past_events.name: Pectra Upgrade (Account Abstraction)
past_events.news_example: Ethereum implemented the Pectra upgrade, introducing paymasters and improved wallet usability.

upcoming_events.name: SEC Approval of Staking in ETH ETFs
upcoming_events.news_example: Analysts expect SEC to rule on staking within ETH ETFs by the end of 2025, potentially unlocking new inflows.

upcoming_events.name: GENIUS & CLARITY Acts (Stablecoin Regulation)
upcoming_events.news_example: Stablecoin-focused U.S. bills such as the GENIUS and CLARITY Acts are gaining traction and could improve Ethereum's regulatory landscape.

upcoming_events.name: Pectra Post-Upgrade Adoption Metrics
upcoming_events.news_example: Post-upgrade, Ethereum may benefit from increasing user migration to smart accounts and efficient L2 transactions.

upcoming_events.name: Institutional Accumulation (e.g. BitMine)
upcoming_events.news_example: BitMine, backed by Founders Fund, acquired 160k ETH, signaling strong institutional confidence.

upcoming_events.name: U.S. CPI, FOMC, and PPI Releases
upcoming_events.news_example: U.S. macroeconomic data (CPI, PPI, FOMC) expected late July could trigger volatility across all crypto markets.
